name: Pizza Golf 2 - all builds before the Vigilante build
name_original: Pizza Golf 2 - all builds before the Vigilante build
description:
All builds from Pizza Golf 2 before it was discontinued a 2nd time. I had loypoll's consent before doing this. This includes the original build, Cucumber's first ever appearance, and the other builds.

Warning: Game is Windows 7/ Windows 8.1/ Windows 10 compatible only.
